description: This file defines functions for constructing and executing a processing pipeline for video data analysis, including stages like object detection, pose estimation, and behavior analysis. It involves building a pipeline with configurable stages and running it iteratively over frames.

methods.name: Tuple[Pipeline,PipelineContext] build_default_pipeline( video_source_path: Optional[str] = None, read_with_opencv: bool = False, extra_config: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, )
methods.description: Constructs a preset pipeline with stages for video frame extraction, object detection, pose estimation, behavior analysis, and event determination, returning the pipeline and its context.

methods.name: Iterable[Dict[str,Any]] run_on_frames( frames: Iterable[Tuple[Any, Optional[int], Optional[float]]], pipeline: Pipeline, )
methods.description: Executes the pipeline stepwise on an iterable of frames, yielding emitted events or results from the stages.

ctags.name: build_default_pipeline
ctags.signature: ( video_source_path: Optional[str] = None, read_with_opencv: bool = False, extra_config: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, )

ctags.name: run_on_frames
ctags.signature: ( frames: Iterable[Tuple[Any, Optional[int], Optional[float]]], pipeline: Pipeline, )
